ConfigItem.Desc: Enables aptX offloading on the secondary audio processor.Note that offloading requires audio subsystem MIB Keys AudioThreadOffload to be enabled and CoreEnable should be disabled.
Enables celt offloading on the secondary audio processor.Note that offloading requires audio subsystem MIB Keys AudioThreadOffload to be enabled and CoreEnable should be disabled.

ConfigItem.Id: aptX Adaptive Decoder Processing On P1
ConfigItem.Desc: Enables aptX adaptive processing on the secondary audio processor. Note that processing requires only audio subsystem MIB Key CoreEnable to be enabled.
